actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A resolution relating to Senate travel expenses.

summary.text: Prohibits a Senator, an employee of a Senator, or an employee of any standing committee or select committee of the Senate from being paid or reimbursed for the difference between the cost of first-class air travel, and the cost of any other class of air travel unless: (1) no other accommodations are available; (2) first-class accommodation is necessary because of the health of the Senator or employee involved; (3) in the case of foreign travel, only first-class accommodation meets satisfactory standards of sanitation, health, or comfort: or (4) the cost of first-class accommodation provided by the air carrier involved does not exceed the cost of other accommodation provided by other air carriers.

titles.title: A resolution relating to Senate travel expenses.
